Jaashir Morris
Recruitment Consultant - Machine Learning & AI Specialist at Harnham
DIRECTOR OF AI/MLRemote(New York)$250K-350K base + Bonus + EquityBe a leader in a company where AI is a key component to the success of the business. This is an impressive opportunity for a Director of AI/ML to lead high-performing engineers and work cross-functionally to scale and grow their AI function that will support future business hypergrowth. If you want to work in a fast-paced environment where you are a key contributor to their growth, this is the job for you!The CompanyThis is an AI-focused company that is doing big things in their industry, creating a platform that accelerates data training. This Director of AI/ML will have a great opportunity to work collaboratively amongst teams and make a meaningful impact in the company.THE ROLEIn This Role:This Director of AI/ML will be responsible for providing technical leadership and guidance across the Engineering team and AI product line.· Lead a team of engineers to align with the business vision· Be a collaborative leader to build out the AI function· Collaborate with stakeholders and project managers, turning business goals into technical solutions· Define best AI/ML driven practices· Grow out the AI team· Be the external face for AI/MLYour Skills And Experience:A successful candidate will likely have the following skills and experience:· High level experience in AI/ML fundamentals· Leadership experience, have built out teams and great people management skills· Fundamental understanding of how full stack SaaS products work, scale, & perform· Understanding of deep neural networks· Commercial experience building architecture on AWSThe BenefitsA competitive base salary of $250,000-$350,000 + Equity + benefitsHow To ApplyPlease register your interest by sending your CV to Jaashir Morris via the Apply link on this page.KEYWORDSMachine Learning | Software Engineer | Python | AWS | GCP | NLP | Natural Language Processing | Media | SWE | MLE | Recommendation Systems | API
